definition: “Art of War”, one of the Seven Military Classics of ancient China 武經七書|武经七书[Wu3 jing1 Qi1 shu1], written by Sun Tzu 孫子|孙子[Sun1 zi3]
grandson/descendant
surname Sun
(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
soldiers/a force/an army/weapons/arms/military/warlike/CL:個|个[ge4]
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: "The Art of War" is the maximum classic in China Military Science.
sentences.chinese: 《孫子兵法》，是中國兵學的最高經典。

sentences.english: Izurieta based much of his tactical thinking on Sun Tzu’s “Art of War.”
sentences.chinese: 伊蘇列塔的戰術思維主要以《孫子兵法》爲藍本。

sentences.english: His Art of War has been passed down to this day. Qilu culture has a long history.
sentences.chinese: 《孫子兵法》流傳至今，齊魯文化源遠流長。

sentences.english: Sun Tzu The Art of War best represents the ancient military strategy of China.
sentences.chinese: 《孫子兵法》是中國古代軍事謀略思想的集大成者。

sentences.english: All of China’s top leaders have read Sun Tzu’s The Art of War.
sentences.chinese: 中國所有的最高領導人都讀過《孫子兵法》。

sentences.english: It goes back to Sun Tzu and The Art of War.
sentences.chinese: 它甚至讓我想起孫子兵法和戰爭的藝術。

sentences.english: The Art of War by Sun Tzu was composed on a bamboo slip in the 6th century.
sentences.chinese: 孫子於6世紀將《孫子兵法》編寫在竹簡上。

sentences.english: "The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting. " -Sun Tzu.
sentences.chinese: 孫子兵法說，“戰爭的最高藝術是不戰而屈人之兵。”

sentences.english: Shi, is a drink praise tsu of the world.
sentences.chinese: 《孫子兵法》是一部飲譽世界的兵學聖典。

sentences.english: It, as well as Military Science of Sun Tzu, is regarded as the great one in military theory.
sentences.chinese: 它與《孫子兵法》可稱爲軍事理論的雙璧。

sentences.english: Sunzi Military Strategy can not only be used in the war, but also can serve as guidance for Mining.
sentences.chinese: 《孫子兵法》可用於戰爭，同樣也可指導採礦。

sentences.english: Inthe art of war you should always try to deceive your enemy.
sentences.chinese: 按照孫子兵法，你應該不斷地迷惑你的敵人。

definition: the Book of History, one of the Five Classics of Confucianism 五經|五经[Wu3 jing1], a compendium of documents which make up the oldest extant texts of Chinese history, from legendary times down to the time of Confucius, also known as 尚書經|尚书经[Shang4 shu1 jing1], 尚書|尚书[Shang4 shu1], 書|书[Shu1]
"Strategies of the Warring States", chronicle of the Warring States Period (475-220 BC), possibly written by Su Qin 蘇秦|苏秦[Su1 Qin2]
the Hundred Schools of Thought, the various schools of thought and their exponents during the Spring and Autumn and Warring States Periods (770-220 BC)
history of philosophy
Sima Qian (145-86 BC), Han Dynasty historian, author of Records of the Grand Historian 史記|史记[Shi3 ji4], known as the father of Chinese historiography
to read and re-read sth until one is familiar with it
Concise History of the Chinese Novel by Lu Xun 鲁迅
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Xiao3 shuo1 Shi3 lu:e4

well-rounded argument/general survey
argument/debate/controversy

The School Sayings of Confucius, a supplement to the Analects/abbr. to 家語|家语[Jia1 yu3]
